name: Lucentek Beyond
description: It has been known for some time that planet Mosoideae is in danger. The threat of invasion from the Valkuren is imminent. Using technology reverse-engineered from the data taken from a Valkuren scout ship, the people of Mosoideae are building up an army to search out and destroy the Valkuren before they can destroy the planet... but are they too late? Lucentek Beyond is an RPG that features a time based battle system with over 15 different spells and abilities. Explore your surroundings in first person perspective. Find hidden objects and quests to power up your group members.
